features.name: Extension Scaffold
features.description: Basic pi extension structure with /doom command, TUI custom component, game loop tick

features.name: Map System
features.description: 2D grid map representation, wall detection, player spawn position
tests: Can query if cell is wall/floor

features.name: Player Movement
features.description: WASD/arrow movement, Q/E rotation, collision detection with walls

features.name: Raycasting Engine
features.description: Cast rays from player FOV, calculate wall distances, fisheye correction

features.name: ASCII Rendering
features.description: Render 3D view as ASCII art with depth shading (█▓▒░ ), proper aspect ratio handling

features.name: HUD - Stats
features.description: Health bar, ammo count, current weapon name displayed at bottom of screen

features.name: HUD - Minimap
features.description: Top-down minimap overlay showing player position, direction arrow, revealed areas

features.name: Level Design
features.description: First playable level with corridors, rooms, interesting layout for navigation

features.name: Enemy Data & Spawning
features.description: Enemy entity structure (position, health, state), spawn points in level, enemy types defined

features.name: Enemy AI
features.description: Enemy behavior: idle, chase player, attack when close, basic pathfinding around walls

features.name: Combat - Shooting
features.description: Space to shoot, hitscan ray from player, hit detection, enemy death, ammo consumption

features.name: Combat - Damage
features.description: Enemies deal damage when close, health decreases, death state, game over trigger

features.name: Pickups
features.description: Health packs, ammo pickups, armor scattered in level, collect on walk-over

features.name: Save/Resume State
features.description: Game state persists across pi sessions via appendEntry, resume from where you left off

features.name: Visual Effects
features.description: Screen flash red on damage, muzzle flash on shoot, death animation, hit feedback

features.name: Multiple Levels
features.description: Exit trigger point, level progression, 3+ distinct levels with increasing difficulty

features.name: Weapon Sprite
features.description: ASCII art gun rendered at bottom center of screen, animates on fire

features.name: Crosshair
features.description: Center-screen crosshair for aiming, shows hit feedback

features.name: Doors
features.description: Interactive doors that open on approach or use key, close after delay, block enemies

features.name: Sprite Rendering System
features.description: Render 2D sprites (enemies, items, decorations) in 3D space with distance scaling and sorting

features.name: Wall Variation
features.description: Different ASCII patterns/characters for different wall types, visual variety for navigation

features.name: Multiple Weapons
features.description: Pistol, shotgun, chaingun with different damage/fire rate/ammo types, number keys to switch

features.name: Automap (TAB)
features.description: Full-screen map view showing explored areas, player position, doors, enemies

features.name: Menu/Title Screen
features.description: ASCII art DOOM title, Press ENTER to start, maybe options menu

features.name: Game Over Screen
features.description: Death screen with restart prompt, maybe ASCII skull, show stats

features.name: Wall Sliding Collision
features.description: Smooth collision that slides along walls instead of dead stop, feels natural
tests: Moving into wall at angle slides along it

features.name: Enemy Projectiles
features.description: Ranged enemies that shoot fireballs/projectiles at player, projectiles travel and can be dodged

features.name: Multiple Enemy Types
features.description: Zombie (melee, weak), Imp (ranged, medium), Demon (fast melee, strong) with different behaviors

features.name: Explosive Barrels
features.description: Destructible barrels that explode when shot, damage nearby enemies and player, chain reactions

features.name: Victory/Level Complete Screen
features.description: Level complete stats: kills %, items %, secrets %, time taken, then proceed to next level

features.name: Difficulty Settings
features.description: Easy/Medium/Hard affecting enemy count, enemy damage, enemy health, ammo scarcity

features.name: Terminal Bell Audio
features.description: Terminal bell (\x07) for shooting, damage taken, pickups - primitive but adds feedback

features.name: Secrets
features.description: Hidden rooms with bonus items, secret walls that open when activated, tracked in stats

features.name: End-Level Stats
features.description: Track kills, items collected, secrets found, time taken during gameplay for level complete screen

features.name: Sprint (Shift)
features.description: Hold shift to run faster, drains stamina or just always available, classic Doom feel

features.name: Keys & Locked Doors
features.description: Color-coded keys (red, blue, yellow) unlock matching doors, keys shown in HUD
tests: Locked doors won't open without key
Keys show in HUD when collected

features.name: Pause Menu
features.description: P or ESC during gameplay pauses game, shows PAUSED overlay with resume/quit options, game tick stops
tests: Can quit to title from pause

features.name: Controls Help
features.description: Help screen showing all keybindings, accessible from title screen and pause menu via H key
